00034 // A function to trim whitespace from both sides of a given string
00035 void CIniFile::Trim(std::string& str, const std::string & ChrsToTrim, int TrimDir)
00036 {
00037     size_t startIndex = str.find_first_not_of(ChrsToTrim);
00038     if (startIndex == std::string::npos){str.erase(); return;}
00039     if (TrimDir < 2) str = str.substr(startIndex, str.size()-startIndex);
00040     if (TrimDir!=1) str = str.substr(0, str.find_last_not_of(ChrsToTrim) + 1);
00041 }

00043 // Load the contents of the INI file
00044 bool CIniFile::Load(std::string FileName, std::vector<Record>& content)
00045 {
00046         string s;                                                                                               // Holds the current line from the ini file
00047         string CurrentSection;                                                                  // Holds the current section name
00048 
00049         ifstream inFile (FileName.c_str());                                             // Create an input filestream
00050         if (!inFile.is_open()) return false;                                    // If the input file doesn't open, then return
00051         content.clear();                                                                                // Clear the content vector
00052 
00053         string comments = "";                                                                   // A string to store comments in
00054 
00055         while(!std::getline(inFile, s).eof())                                   // Read until the end of the file
00056         {
00057                 Trim(s);                                                                                        // Trim whitespace from the ends
00058                 if(!s.empty())                                                                          // Make sure its not a blank line
00059                 {
00060                         Record r;                                                                               // Define a new record
00061 
00062                         if((s[0]=='#')||(s[0]==';'))                                    // Is this a commented line?
00063                         {
00064                                 if ((s.find('[')==string::npos)&&                       // If there is no [ or =
00065                                         (s.find('=')==string::npos))                    // Then it's a comment
00066                                 {
00067                                         comments += s + '\n';                                   // Add the comment to the current comments string
00068                                 }
00069                                 else 
00070                                 {
00071                                         r.Commented = s[0];                                             // Save the comment character
00072                                         s.erase(s.begin());                                             // Remove the comment for further processing
00073                                         Trim(s);
00074                                 }                                                                                       // Remove any more whitespace
00075                         }
00076                         else r.Commented = ' ';                                                 // else mark it as not being a comment
00077 
00078                         if(s.find('[')!=string::npos)                                   // Is this line a section?
00079                         {               
00080                                 s.erase(s.begin());                                                     // Erase the leading bracket
00081                                 s.erase(s.find(']'));                                           // Erase the trailing bracket
00082                                 r.Comments = comments;                                          // Add the comments string (if any)
00083                                 comments = "";                                                          // Clear the comments for re-use
00084                                 r.Section = s;                                                          // Set the Section value
00085                                 r.Key = "";                                                                     // Set the Key value
00086                                 r.Value = "";                                                           // Set the Value value
00087                                 CurrentSection = s;
00088                         }
00089 
00090                         if(s.find('=')!=string::npos)                                   // Is this line a Key/Value?
00091                         {
00092                                 r.Comments = comments;                                          // Add the comments string (if any)
00093                                 comments = "";                                                          // Clear the comments for re-use
00094                                 r.Section = CurrentSection;                                     // Set the section to the current Section
00095                                 r.Key = s.substr(0,s.find('='));                        // Set the Key value to everything before the = sign
00096                                 r.Value = s.substr(s.find('=')+1);                      // Set the Value to everything after the = sign
00097                         }
00098                         if(comments == "")                                                              // Don't add a record yet if its a comment line
00099                                 content.push_back(r);                                           // Add the record to content
00100                 }
00101         }
00102         
00103         inFile.close();                                                                                 // Close the file
00104         return true;
00105 }

00107 // Returns all sections names of a given file
00108 std::vector<std::string> CIniFile::GetSectionNames(std::string FileName)
00109 {
00110         vector<string> data;                                                                    // Holds the return data
00111         vector<Record> content;                                                                 // Holds the current record                                                                                                     // Holds the current record
00112 
00113         if (Load(FileName, content))                                                    // Make sure the file is loaded
00114         {
00115                 for (int i=0;i<(int)content.size();i++)                         // Loop through the content
00116                 {
00117                         if(content[i].Key =="")                                                 // If there is no key value, then its a section
00118                                 data.push_back(content[i].Section);                     // Add the section to the return data
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 
00122         return data;                                                                                    // Return the data
00123 }
00124 
00125 // Returns all key contents of a specific section
00126 std::vector<CIniFile::Record> CIniFile::GetSection(std::string SectionName, std::string FileName)
00127 {
00128         vector<Record> data;                                                                    // Holds the return data
00129         vector<Record> content;                                                                 // Holds the current record
00130 
00131         if (Load(FileName, content))                                                    // Make sure the file is loaded
00132         {
00133                 for (int i=0;i<(int)content.size();i++)                         // Loop through the content
00134                 {
00135                         if((content[i].Section == SectionName) &&               // If this is the section name we want
00136                                 (content[i].Key != ""))                                         // but not the section name itself
00137                                 data.push_back(content[i]);                                     // Add the record to the return data
00138                 }
00139         }
00140         
00141         return data;                                                                                    // Return the data
00142 }
00143 
00144 // Returns the contents of a specific key within a given section
00145 std::vector<CIniFile::Record> CIniFile::GetRecord(std::string KeyName, 
00146                                                   std::string SectionName,
00147                                                   std::string FileName)
00148 {
00149         vector<Record> data;                                                                    // Holds the return data
00150         vector<Record> content;                                                                 // Holds the current record
00151 
00152         if (Load(FileName, content))                                                    // Make sure the file is loaded
00153         {
00154                 vector<Record>::iterator iter = std::find_if(content.begin(), 
00155                                 content.end(), 
00156                                 CIniFile::RecordSectionKeyIs(SectionName,KeyName));     // Locate the Record
00157 
00158                 if (iter == content.end()) return data;                         // The Record was not found
00159 
00160                 data.push_back (*iter);                                                         // The Record was found
00161         }
00162         return data;                                                                                    // Return the Record
00163 }
00164 
00165 // Returns the value of a specific key within a given section
00166 std::string CIniFile::GetValue(std::string KeyName, std::string SectionName, std::string FileName)
00167 {
00168         vector<Record> content = GetRecord(KeyName,SectionName, FileName);      // Get the Record
00169 
00170         if(!content.empty())                                                                    // Make sure there is a value to return
00171                 return content[0].Value;                                                        // And return the value
00172 
00173         return "";                                                                                              // No value was found
00174 }

00176 // Returns all key contents of all sections
00177 std::vector<CIniFile::Record> CIniFile::GetSections(std::string FileName)
00178 {
00179         vector<Record> data;                                                                    // Holds the return data
00180         vector<Record> content;                                                                 // Holds the current record                                                                                                     // Holds the current record
00181 
00182         if (Load(FileName, content))                                                    // Make sure the file is loaded
00183         {
00184                 for (int i=0;i<(int)content.size();i++)                         // Loop through the content
00185                 {
00186                         if(content[i].Key == "")                                                // If this is a section 
00187                                 data.push_back(content[i]);                                     // Add the record to the return data
00188                 }
00189         }
00190         
00191         return data;                                                                                    // Return the data
00192 }

00194 // Returns all key contents of the file.
00195 std::vector<CIniFile::Record> CIniFile::GetAllRecords(std::string FileName)
00196 {
00197         vector<Record> content;                                                         // Collection for the Records
00198         Load(FileName, content);                                                        // Read the file.
00199         return content;
00200 }
